---
title: "Metrics"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
case_countries2 <- read.csv("case_countries2.csv")
death_countries2 <- read.csv("death_countries2.csv")
```

Column {data-width=350, .tabset}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Cases Confirmed

```{r}
boxplot(case_countries2$cases_per_capita ~ case_countries2$Income.group, 
        xlab = "Income Group",
        ylab = "Cases per Capita",
        main = "Cases by Country Income Group",
        sub = "Cases Confirmed")
```

### Deaths Confirmed

```{r}
boxplot(death_countries2$cases_per_capita ~ death_countries2$Income.group,
        xlab = "Income Group",
        ylab = "Deaths per Capita",
        main = "Deaths by Country Income Group",
        sub = "Deaths Confirmed")
```


Column {data-width=350, .tabset}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


### Cases Confirmed

```{r}
boxplot(case_countries2$cases_per_capita ~ case_countries2$Region)
```

### Deaths Confirmed

```{r}
boxplot(death_countries2$cases_per_capita ~ case_countries2$Region)
```
